item.value: We will solve this problem tomorrow morning.
Завтра утром мы решим эту проблему.
Hello! We'll check it out now.
Мы проверим это сейчас.
Hello! Let's check it out now.
Сейчас проверим.

The answer to problems with the site heartlandartifacts.com We notice that the sync is not keeping pace with the catalog update. You need to set up automatic synchronization as described in the instructions: https:docs.google.comdocumentd1pB01I5nv8cXUynJR-g-i95JjPxCgencKt279M8rwikAeditheading=h.8np1wpqu4047 Now on the site you have synchronization only during the moments of activity on the site, switching to automatic mode will allow you to increase the number of synchronized lots. The current sync setting is only suitable for small auctions, in your case this is not enough. 1) Missing pictures for new lots in auction 76 have appeared. 2) Changes to lots in Bidspirit after synchronization are taken into account in the plugin and will be updated on the site during synchronization. 3) Archive auctions 1-32 were on the ignored list. The error in which lots do not appear, but when the filter is applied, is covered in one of the latest updates when we added support for sorting lots with letter indices. To solve it, remove the auction from the ignored list and enable the option in the "Force sync" plugin settings (attached screenshot). After the next synchronization, the problems will be resolved, but it is imperative for you to do automatic sync. We also noticed that you have added all auctions except 79 to the list of exclusions, this is not necessary, since active auctions have priority over archived auctions.
The answer to problems with the site heartlandartifacts.com
Ответ по проблемам с сайтом heartlandartifacts.com
To solve it, remove the auction from the ignored list and enable the option in the "Force sync" plugin settings (attached screenshot).
Для её решения уберите аукциона из списка игнорируемых и включите опцию в настройках плагина "Force sync" (приложил скриншот).
The error in which lots do not appear, but when the filter is applied, is covered in one of the latest updates when we added support for sorting lots with letter indices.

The error in which lots do not appear, but when the filter is applied, is covered in one of the latest updates when we added support for sorting lots with letter indices. After the next synchronization, the problems will be resolved, but it is imperative for you to do automatic sync.

We notice that the sync is not keeping pace with the catalog update. You need to set up automatic synchronization as described in the instructions: https:docs.google.comdocumentd1pB01I5nv8cXUynJR-g-i95JjPxCgencKt279M8rwikAeditheading=h.8np1wpqu4047 Now on the site you have synchronization only during the moments of activity on the site, switching to automatic mode will allow you to increase the number of synchronized lots. The current sync setting is only suitable for small auctions, in your case this is not enough. 1) Missing pictures for new lots in auction 76 have appeared. 2) Changes to lots in Bidspirit after synchronization are taken into account in the plugin and will be updated on the site during synchronization. 3) Archive auctions 1-32 were on the ignored list, cleared the list. The error in which lots do not appear, but when the filter is applied, is covered in one of the latest updates when we added support for sorting lots with letter indices. After the next synchronization, the problems will be resolved, but it is imperative for you to do automatic sync. We also noticed that you have added all auctions except 79 to the list of exclusions, this is not necessary, since active auctions have priority over archived auctions.
логировать данные
logging Data
второй запрос
data Second
get Second Lang Code
Creates duplicates of lots and auctions in the second language selected in Bidspirit
Создаёт дубли лотов и аукционов на втором языке выбранном в Bidspirit
Создаёт дубли лотов на втором языке выбранном в Bidspirit
Enable synchronization of multi languages
Включить синхронизацию нескольких языков
uco current lang code checker
Multi Language Support
Maybe. We figured out how to simplify the error detection process, we will add in the future.
Возможно. Мы придумали как упростить процесс выявления ошибок, добавим в будущем.
Maybe. We will add logging to the plugin.
Возможно. Мы добавим логирование в плагин.
I'll tell you now
Сейчас скажу
This problem is again related to the lack of uniqueness of the name of the auctions.
Эта проблема опять же связана с не достаточной уникальностью имени аукционов.
Those. two auctions in Bidspirit are suitable for one of the auctions
Т.е. под один из аукционов подходит два аукциона в Bidspirit
Response from Bidspirit:
Ответ от Bidspirit:
Here is the auction that syncs with Bidspirit
Вот тот аукцион который синхронизируется с Bidspirit
This auction is in no way connected with Bidspirit, as it changed its slug and at that moment the synchronization with it was broken.
Этот аукцион ни как не связан с Bidspirit, так как ему сменили slug и в тот момент синхронизация с ним разорвалась.
Ещё раз повторю, этот аукцион ни как не связан с Bidspirit, так как ему сменили slug и в тот момент синхронизация с ним разорвалась.
More precisely, how long ago did you publish it?
Точнее как давно вы его опубликовали?
How long ago did you add this auction to Bidspirit?
Как давно вы добавили этот аукцион на Bidspirit?
Hello! Add another domain for this client:
Добавьте ещё один домен для этого клиента:
Because Bidspirit did not allow this domain
